• CI Leader submits proposal into IDEAS module on the LEAN Portal.
  • All proposals require a minimum: Project Name, Goal, Participants, Implementation Cost, CAPEX, stimated Monthly CI Proposal Savings, Estimated Implementation Time, Hoshin Metric impacted.

•Site GM, Site Finance, Business Excellence review and provide feedback (Approve, Reject, Need more information)

• Business Excellence Lead or GM moves proposal to Approved.

 

  • Once proposal is approved, CI is active, and owner/participants can start implementation
  • Project owner will be responsible for managing the project. Project tasks/milestones, task owners and due dates.
  • Weekly status reviews should be done at the project team level. Management reviews will be minimum monthly.

 

  • Once project is implemented, project owner will input implementation date and change CI status to Verification. •Verification data/Hoshin metric(s) will be reviewed, and monthly data will be tracked for the next 12 months.

 

  • After tracking savings through the calendar year, Business Excellence will either close the project or continue tracking for a minimum 3 months
CI Proposal
CI Evaluation
Implementation
Verification

CI Close
